description: Manual mappings for split-cour anime to handle episode offset calculations. Kitsu/MAL split seasons into parts, but IMDb treats them as continuous. This maps Kitsu/MAL part episodes to correct IMDb episode numbers.

kitsu:43247.title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu 2nd Season Part 2
kitsu:43247.notes: Part 1 has episodes 1-13, Part 2 has episodes 1-12 (mapped to IMDb 14-25)

kitsu:44240.title: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season Part 2
kitsu:44240.notes: Part 1 has episodes 1-16, Part 2 has episodes 1-12 (mapped to IMDb 17-28)

_instructions.description: How to add new split-cour mappings
_instructions.why_this_exists: Kitsu/MAL split seasons into parts (e.g., Part 1: episodes 1-13, Part 2: episodes 1-12), but IMDb numbers them continuously (1-25). When a Kitsu/MAL addon provides episode 5 of Part 2, we need to add offset 13 to get IMDb episode 18.
how_to_add: 1. Find the Kitsu or MAL ID for the specific part (e.g., kitsu:39587 for Re:Zero S2P2)
2. Add a key with format 'kitsu:ID' or 'mal:ID'
3. Specify the IMDb ID and season number for the series
4. Set episode_offset (number of episodes before this part starts)
5. For Part 2 starting at IMDb episode 14, offset = 13

example.without_offset: Would try to fetch rating for IMDb S2E5
example.with_offset: Correctly fetches rating for IMDb S2E18 (5 + 13)
